text: Gedelek is a small village in the Marmara Region of Turkey and Orhangazi district of Bursa Province. It is known for its pickles, especially for its hot chilli peppers.(30 September 2014). TURŞUDA ADRES TEK 'GEDELEK' , Bursa Province websiteMEDYA FESTİVAL ORHANGAZİ GEDELEK TURŞU FESTİVALİ 53.BÖLÜM, TRT Avazhttp://www.habermonitor.com/en/haber/detay/pickled-gedelek-will-be-the- symbol-of-orhanga/467400/(28 April 2008). Small villages embrace tactics of big business, Hürriyet Daily News Population in 2002 was 1380. ==References== Category:Populated places in Bursa Province
title: Gedelek, Orhangazi
